body_html:
Basically explicit messaging needs to be handled by MPI users, while the interface provided by TF is higher (e.g. node placement for model parallelism) and the design of send/recv node makes it compatible with single-device graph execution.

Please refer to section 3.2 of the TF white paper for details.

body:
Basically explicit messaging needs to be handled by MPI users, while the interface provided by TF is higher (e.g. node placement for model parallelism) and the design of send/recv node makes it compatible with single-device graph execution.

Please refer to section 3.2 of the TF white paper for details.
